title: Website generated PDF font, similar to OCR-B
author: potatoes

comments.content: That's what I thought too but the cent and dollar sign are different. The line does not go through completely as in OCR-B.
The numbers are slightly off too. The 1 and 4 specifically.
Ok i see what you sayin, Well damn thats confusing.
Yeah, it's very strange. Just the slightest difference. Only thing I can think of is they use OCR-B for text and a different font for numerical.
